start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Recharge API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: The value of the Access Token generated. See the docs for more information.

use_orders_deprecated_api.title: Use `Orders` Deprecated API
use_orders_deprecated_api.description: Define whether or not the `Orders` stream should use the deprecated `2021-01` API version, or use `2021-11`, otherwise.
